hero.description: Explore our site to discover our products, services and vision for a sustainable future.

Index.title: We care About Ur Smile!
Index.subtitle: We believe in a holistic approach to oral health. It's not just about achieving a beautiful smile – it's about building a foundation for a lifetime of healthy teeth and gums.

heroButton.name: Invest in your smile - it`s worth it !

About.title: A Leading Algerian Company in Non-Woven Textiles Since 2020
About.description: Welcome to SARL BENNOUR Industry and Services Since its establishment in 2020, SARL BENNOUR Industry and Services has emerged as a key player in the non-woven textile industry in Algeria. Located in the KOUNININE Activity Zone, in the El Oued province, our company leverages its expertise to serve vital sectors such as agriculture, healthcare, food processing, and commerce. We specialize in the production of non-woven textile solutions designed to meet the highest standards of quality, hygiene, and durability. Our goal is to offer innovative, environmentally friendly products tailored to the specific needs of our clients.

Services.title: High Quality Products For You
Services.description: Discover our complete range of single-use medical protective equipment, designed to ensure safety, hygiene, and comfort in all professional environments. Whether for healthcare staff, patients, or visitors, our products meet the strictest health standards.

sac.title: Practical, sustainable and ecological packaging solutions

shirt.title: T-shirt bag
shirt.description: Lightweight bag with T-shirt shaped handles, ideal for everyday shopping and retail.

shopping.title: Shopping bag
shopping.description: Reusable bag with strong handles, designed for shopping and carrying bulky items.

box.title: Box bag
box.description: Keep your smile healthy and bright with our gentle cleaning and shine service for your teeth.

caba.title: Sac CABA
caba.description: Sturdy bag with reinforced handles, often used for heavy purchases or as a promotional bag.

Cap.title: Medical Cap
Cap.description: Breathable, non-woven surgical bouffant cap. Convenient and breathable, it allows the kitchen to maintain the hygiene in the operating room.

Chaussure.title: shoe covers
Chaussure.description: Disposable medical shoe covers, made of non-woven or plastic. Protect against cross-contamination in sterile environments.

Combinaison.title: Protective suit
Combinaison.description: Disposable protective suit designed to protect against particles, liquids, and infectious agents. For use in medical, industrial, or healthcare settings.

Casaque.title: Surgical gown
Casaque.description: Sterile, single-use surgical gown. Provides a protective barrier against fluids and infectious agents. Used in operating rooms.

Blouse.title: Blouse medicals
Blouse.description: Lightweight and durable disposable medical gown. Protects against splashes and contamination. Ideal for clinical and hospital environments.

mask3.title: 3-ply mask
mask3.description: Disposable 3-ply mask, made up of three filter layers. Effective protection against splashes and particles. For medical and general use.

Denture.title: prosthodontics
Denture.description: Dentures are like dress-up for your mouth, giving you a full set of dazzling pretend teeth for a winning smile!

minor.title: Minor Surgery
minor.description: Need a minor dental procedure? We're here to help! Our clinic offers a variety of small surgeries, performed with the utmost precision and care, ensuring your comfort and optimal results.

gumy.title: Gingivectomy
gumy.description: A procedure to remove excess gum tissue, improving gum health and enhancing the appearance of your smile.

Wisdom.title: Wisdom Tooth Extraction
Wisdom.description: Surgical removal of wisdom teeth to prevent pain, crowding, or infection, ensuring long-term oral health.
